scripts.build: npm run build-production && npm run build-development && npm run build-polyfills
scripts.build-polyfills: terser -o obj/javascript/polyfill.bundle.js -c -m --ecma 5 -- Resources/Scripts/Polyfills/promise.js Resources/Scripts/Polyfills/eventTarget.js Resources/Scripts/Polyfills/abortController.js Resources/Scripts/Polyfills/fetch.js node_modules/systemjs/dist/system.js node_modules/symbol-es6/symbol-es6.js Resources/Scripts/Polyfills/utils.js
